betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Bedrock Ore deposits are an infinite source of resourses which can be obtained by using a Large Mining Drill and a Bedrock Ore Processor.

The Large Mining Drill is used to excavate Raw Bedrock Ores from their deposits. The Drill requires Sulfuric Acid aswell as a Drillbit to work. Depth Rock will have to be blasted in order for the drill to make it to the deposit.

The Bedrock Ore Processor takes Raw Bedrock Ore obtained from the Large Mining Drill and breaks it down into smaller pieces, each with different products that can be obtained from them. Ore Slop, which is created when the machine is operating, can be processed into many useful products, especially when it is sent through an Electroylysis Machine.

The Bedrock Ore Desity Scanner shows information on the composition of Bedrock Ore deposits.
